title: Introducing: Running Smoke
description:
In 2015, Derek White made his debut as the first ever indigenous NASCAR Cup driver. A few months later, he was arrested on smuggling charges in Canada's biggest sting operation in years. Now, he's fighting his case in court, and it may change the future of native rights. 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
